response.overview: “Kimi ni Todoke” is a heartfelt coming-of-age story about a shy and misunderstood high school girl named Sawako. Because of her quiet demeanor and eerie resemblance to a horror film character, her classmates often avoid her — despite her kind and gentle nature. Things begin to change when she forms an unexpected connection with Kazehaya, a cheerful and well-liked classmate. As their friendship deepens, Sawako slowly comes out of her shell, making new friends and experiencing the highs and lows of first love.
response.title: From Me To You
